sections.name: Table: Staves

sections.text: The staves in this chapter follow the normal rules for magical staves as described in the Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook.

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
The top of this rosewood shaft narrows and then expands again, bound by a number of metal rings. It allows use of the following spells:

  • bear's endurance (1 charge)
  • bull's strength (1 charge)
  • cat's grace (1 charge)
  • greater magic weapon (1 charge)

misc.value: Craft Staff, bear's endurance, bull's strength, cat's grace, greater magic weapon

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
The thorns embedded in this gnarled length of wood make it rather tricky for the unwary to grasp. It allows use of the following spells:

  • blindness/deafness (1 charge)
  • charm person (1 charge)
  • hold person (1 charge)
  • inflict moderate wounds (1 charge)
  • baleful polymorph (2 charges)
  • bestow curse (2 charges)
  • vampiric touch (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, baleful polymorph, bestow curse, blindness/deafness, charm person, hold person, inflict moderate wounds, vampiric touch

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
This gorgeous teak shaft has many gold and silver coins hammered into it. It allows use of the following spells:

  • identify (1 charge)
  • locate object (1 charge)
  • magic aura (1 charge)
  • secret chest (2 charges)
  • legend lore (3 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, identify, legend lore, locate object, magic aura, secret chest

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
This walking stick, which still has dark gray bark along its entire length, branches into a decorative fork at its top. It allows use of the following spells:

  • detect snares and pits (1 charge)
  • endure elements (1 charge)
  • longstrider (1 charge)
  • pass without trace (1 charge)
  • freedom of movement (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, detect snares and pits, endure elements, freedom of movement, longstrider, pass without trace

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
The elaborate swirls and delicate flecks of shining metal adorning the head of this white wooden shaft makes it seem almost as much a long mace as a staff. It allows use of the following spells:

  • ray of enfeeblement (1 charge)
  • ray of exhaustion (1 charge)
  • scorching ray (1 charge)
  • enervation (2 charges)
  • disintegrate (3 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, disintegrate, enervation, ray of enfeeblement, ray of exhaustion, scorching ray

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
Dark and solid, this worn staff looks to be carved of rough stone, yet feels and weighs like light wood. It allows use of the following spells:

  • arcane lock (1 charge)
  • grease (1 charge)
  • wind wall (1 charge)
  • wall of fire (2 charges)
  • wall of ice (2 charges)
  • wall of stone (3 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, arcane lock, grease, wall of fire, wall of ice, wall of stone, wind wall

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
Soon after falling into the hands of a new owner, this piece of finely varnished cedar develops ornamental brass keys, strings, or other decorations that make it look like a stylized version of its owner's favorite type of musical instrument. It allows use of the following spells:

  • calm emotions (1 charge)
  • glibness (1 charge)
  • hypnotic pattern (1 charge)
  • pyrotechnics (1 charge)
  • enthrall (2 charges)
  • major image (2 charges)
  • sculpt sound (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, calm emotions, enthrall, glibness, hypnotic pattern, major image, pyrotechnics, sculpt sound

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
The forked top of this walnut shaft resembles a combination of a dowsing rod and the curled horns of a beast, a delicate gemstone hovering between its enfolding arms. The staff allows use of the following spells:

  • augury (1 charge)
  • speak with dead (1 charge)
  • divination (2 charges)
  • commune (3 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, augury, commune, divination, speak with dead

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
This iron-shod black wood staff allows use of the following spells:

  • bane (1 charge)
  • cause fear (1 charge)
  • command (1 charge)
  • magic weapon (1 charge)
  • align weapon (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, align weapon, bane, cause fear, command, magic weapon

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
Smoky spirals adorn the length of this staff, having an almost hypnotic effect. The staff allows use of the following spells:

  • deep slumber (1 charge)
  • ray of exhaustion (1 charge)
  • dream (2 charges)
  • nightmare (2 charges)
  • waves of fatigue (2 charges)
  • symbol of sleep (3 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, deep slumber, dream, nightmare, symbol of sleep, ray of exhaustion, waves of fatigue

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
Holes in this metal shaft cause it to emit an eerie moan when swung through the air. It allows use of the following spells:

  • shatter (1 charge)
  • sound burst (1 charge)
  • shout (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, shatter, shout, sound burst

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
This ominous staff allows use of the following spells:

  • deathwatch (1 charge)
  • detect undead (1 charge)
  • gentle repose (1 charge)
  • speak with dead (2 charges)
  • death ward (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, death ward, deathwatch, detect undead, gentle repose, speak with dead

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
This twisted, dark gray staff allows use of the following spells:

  • disguise self (1 charge)
  • invisibility (1 charge)
  • nondetection (1 charge)
  • greater invisibility (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, disguise self, greater invisibility, invisibility, nondetection

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
This length of hemlock-shrouded oak gives off the faintest whiff of rot and corruption. It allows use of the following spells:

  • stinking cloud (1 charge)
  • cloudkill (2 charges)

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
The tip of this dark wooden shaft holds a piece of hard, chalk-like stone. The staff allows use of the following spells:

  • alarm (1 charge)
  • magic mouth (1 charge)
  • phantom trap (1 charge)
  • explosive runes (2 charges)
  • fire trap (2 charges)
  • sepia snake sigil (2 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, alarm, explosive runes, fire trap, magic mouth, phantom trap, sepia snake sigil

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
A clear crystal lens is affixed to the top of this length of brass and scaled skin. The staff allows use of the following spells:

  • arcane eye (1 charge)
  • arcane sight (1 charge)
  • see invisibility (1 charge)
  • prying eyes (2 charges)
  • scrying (2 charges)
  • true seeing (3 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, arcane eye, arcane sight, prying eyes, see invisibility, scrying, true seeing

sections.name: Description
sections.text:
The carved surface of this solid oaken beam always depicts a scene with the opposite qualities of the current weather (wet on dry days, dry on wet days, and so on). It allows use of the following spells:

  • fog cloud (1 charge)
  • gust of wind (1 charge)
  • wind wall (1 charge)
  • ice storm (2 charges)
  • sleet storm (2 charges)
  • control weather (3 charges)

misc.value: Craft Staff, control weather, fog cloud, gust of wind, ice storm, sleet storm, wind wall
